metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

You can create a blank PDF, rather than beginning with a file, a clipboard image, or scanning.

Select a predefined set of options from the  Default  Settings  menu or click Edit to view or
To add security to the PDF, choose one of the following options, or click Edit to view or change

subsection_analysis.refined_text: The Create a PDF tool opens. Do any of the following:   In Acrobat, select Create from the global toolbar.
The Create a PDF tool opens. Do any of the following:   In Acrobat, select Create from the global bar. On the le  rail, select Blank page , and then select Create .

Adobe PDF Security To add security to the PDF, choose one of the following options, or click Edit to view or change the security settings:   Reconfirm Security For Each Job: Opens the Adobe PDF Security dialog box each time you create a PDF using the Adobe PDF printer. The Preferences include Adobe PDF - specific options for the conversion process; the Properties dialog box contains tabs of options that are available for any type of printer.
You can create lists and, conversely, convert a list item to a paragraph or change list types. Manage list items using the list controls (bulleted and numbered) in the left Format panel.

The extracted pages are placed in a new document. To keep the original pages intact and create a single PDF for the extracted pages , deselect both options. To create a single -page PDF for each extracted page, select Extract pages as separate files .

The extracted pages are placed in a new document. Extracted pages include the content and the form fields, comments, and links of the original document. To keep the original pages intact and create a single PDF for the extracted pages, deselect both options.

Note: Saving a digitally signed PDF invalidates the signature. Save a PDF Use this method to save PDFs, including PDF Portfolios , and PDFs in which you have added comments, form field entries, and digital signatures. Adobe Acrobat Reader users can save a copy of a PDF or PDF Portfolio if the creator of the document has enabled usage rights.
If a document is open in another application, go to the document, right-click, and select Paste to paste th e copied selection directly into the target document.

Interactive form To create an interactive form , use the Prepare Forms tool. See Create a form from an existing document . Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro) You can change a flat form to a fillable form by either using the Prepare Form tool or enabling the Fill   Sign tools.
An overview of the document is generated with section heading s and summaries. Selecting a summary takes you directly to the corresponding section in the document for more detailed information.
